info.description: This API covers publicly accessible merchant actions
info.title: The Helcim API

paymentType.description: Payment Type. Valid payment types are purchase | preauth | verify

amount.description: The amount of the transaction to be processed.

customerCode.description: This is the code of an existing customer in Helcim associated with this checkout.

invoiceNumber.description: This is the number of an existing invoice in Helcim associated with this checkout.

paymentMethod.description: This is the payment method (credit card, ACH) that customer can use to pay the amount. cc | ach | cc-ach

allowPartial.description: This is used to determine whether the partial payment UI will be displayed to the customer.

hasConvenienceFee.description: This is used to apply the convenience fee rate to credit card transaction should customer chooses this payment method.

taxAmount.description: This is used to enable level 2 processing lower rates. The value should be the dollar amount of the tax to 2 decimal places.

hideExistingPaymentDetails.description: This is used to hide the existing payment information of the customer.

setAsDefaultPaymentMethod.description: This is used to set the payment method of the transaction to default for that customer.

terminalId.description: This is used to process the card transaction on the specified terminal.

customerCode.description: The unique customer code. If blank, it will be automatically generated.

contactName.description: The primary contact name (full name) of the customer.

businessName.description: The business name of the customer. There must be either a contact name or business name present.

cellPhone.description: The cell phone number of the customer.

province.description: 2 letter abbreviation of the province (AB, BC, CA). Required field if country is CAN or USA.
2 letter abbreviation of the province (AB, BC, CA). Required field if country is CAN or USA.

invoiceNumber.description: The unique invoice number. If blank, it will be automatically generated.

notes.description: The content that would be displayed under comment section of the invoice.

province.description: 2 letter abbreviation of the province (AB, BC, CA). Required field if country is CAN or USA.

name.description: The name of the person who would pickup the item.

description.description: The description of the item or product.

total.description: Total amount based on quantity and price of the item.

checkoutToken.description: The checkout token is used to initialize Helcim Pay

secretToken.description: The secret token is used to validate the transaction response
